name: サイバーガード - Cyber Guard
name_original: サイバーガード - Cyber Guard
description:
Endless Rouge-like Tower Defense with cute Cyber Guards. Oh nyo! The World Wide Web is under attack by malwares and bugs, it is your duty as the WWW specialist to deploy cyber guards and build a defense system to stop the invasions, in this rougelike tower defense game!

How to play:
Mouse, point and click to deploy your cyber guards onto the field, clearing waves of enemies will earn you energy to spend on upgrades to make you defense stronger.

Upgrades:

Energy could be spent on upgrading the girls on the field to boost their attack!

Or spend it in the energy slot to receive 1 out of 3 upgrades of your choice, which includes gaining base HP, unlocking and receiving extra cyber guards, stat bonuses for all your cyber guards and an unique effect for each individual cyber guards!

Characters:
7 playable characters, separated into Melee and Ranged attack, but each character comes with their own unique upgrades, making them standout and shine in certain situations, so make sure you familiarize yourself with them to develop your own playstyles and strategies!

Enemies:
5 Unique enemy types with different stats in HP, Defense and Speed, a mini boss, bigger size with bigger stats, will also show up every few waves so make sure you're ready to deal with them!

Patchlog:

  • 1.0.0 Initial Gameplay Release
  • 1.0.1 Enemy Hp Scaling adjustment
